site.name: Léo Sgarbi
site.title: DevPortfolio | Junior Front-End Developer
site.description: Front-end developer portfolio specializing in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I work as a front-end developer focused on React, Next, Tailwind and Styled Components, always seeking to improve my skills and contribute to innovative projects.
about.p2: As a junior developer, I am always looking to learn and grow. I value environments that encourage professional development and knowledge sharing.
about.goalText: Develop more React projects and raise my code quality.
about.learningText: Working to turn messy code into well-structured solutions.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A brief description of the project, technologies used and challenges overcome.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to contact me through the channels below.
